# colorMode

**Instance Property**

The working color space and storage format of the canvas.

## Declaration

```swift
var colorMode: ColorRenderingMode { get set }
```

## Managing opacity and color

- **isOpaque**: A Boolean that indicates whether the canvas is fully opaque.

items.description: A Boolean that indicates whether the canvas is fully opaque.
